sentences.english: Even so, any skunk captured in Illinois is euthanized.
sentences.chinese: 即使这样，伊利诺伊州内捕获的臭鼬均实施安乐死。

sentences.english: It is the Kookaburra and Skunk Kingdoms that greet you today.
sentences.chinese: 今天是笑翠鸟和臭鼬王国向你们问候。

sentences.english: Slim swans and slender skunks swim in the slippery slime.
sentences.chinese: 苗条的天鹅和纤细的臭鼬在滑滑的黏泥上游泳。

sentences.english: The skunk helps farmers by eating the rodents that chew on their crops.
sentences.chinese: 臭鼬帮助农民吃掉那些啃食庄稼的啮齿类动物。

sentences.english: Before, we had a lot of raccoons, but this is the first time we've had so many skunks.
sentences.chinese: 以前有很多浣熊，但这么多臭鼬还是头一遭。

sentences.english: But Kaulback says there's nothing adorable about a skunk.
sentences.chinese: 但考贝克说，臭鼬身上没有哪一点能让人们喜欢。

sentences.english: One of the reasons skunks have a bad reputation is because they can really stink.
sentences.chinese: 臭鼬名声不好的原因之一就是因为它们很臭。

sentences.english: Skunks are small, gentle animals with attractive black and white coats.
sentences.chinese: 臭鼬是温顺的小动物，黑白色的皮毛魅力无穷。

sentences.english: Tease a skunk in Minnesota, and they can haul you off to jail.
sentences.chinese: 如果你在明尼苏达州戏弄臭鼬，你也可能会入狱。

sentences.english: I spend my time chasing skunks and bats, so I know how frustrating it can be.
sentences.chinese: 我追踪过臭鼬和蝙蝠，我知道抓捕动物有多困难。

definition: wolverine (Gulo gulo), also named 貂熊[diao1 xiong2]
aardwolf (Proteles cristatus), a small insectivorous relative of the hyena
